item.title: I made a minigame where you loose stuff how can i make a waring screen?
item.dc:creator: @jaloko jaloko
item.description:
@jaloko wrote:

it helps alot. for the simple fact that your probaly not going to get help on this sort of thing. and by send message i mean. sendMessage("WARNING!! THIS MINI GAME IS NOT A "SAFE" MINI GAME YOU DO LOSE ITEMS!");

that comes srt8 from one of my mini games(i have like 11 of them) and i do know how to make the warning window but it would be as long as a tut to explane it and to be honst. your really rude so why would i want to.

oh and by the way ill give you a hint. know when you click the log out button? thats half the code right there. you really need to know java to do what your asking.

item.title: I made a minigame where you loose stuff how can i make a waring screen?
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

This is what i have now:(delta)

if(objectID == #### && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval){ sendQuest("@red@WARING!!", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@yel@If you die here you loose your items!.", 8148); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); sM("You enter the game, "+PlayerHandler.pcWaitTimer+" till game starts."); toX = ####; toY = ####; actionInterval = 2500; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

It works. But how can i make it like “Enter Yes or No” Any ideas ?

Or like when you click on the object a npc say You loose your items here are you sure you wanna go in?

And then like yes or no ? plz help

Read full topic
item.source: I made a minigame where you loose stuff how can i make a waring screen?
